means: 刺( stab的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: She tried to thrust back the little stabs of home - sickness.
sentence.Network_cn: 她努力排遣涌上心头的思乡之情.

sentence.Network_en: Now the first bolt of lightning stabs the earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时,第一个雷电劈向大地.
她影响了她周围的气氛.

PerfectNetExp.abs: it grates on the ears and stabs the mind ., 它刺激着人耳并鞭挞着精神.

list.abs: 医学制药词汇-110 - 英霸英语 ... st 足阳酶经 stab cell 杆状细胞 stability 稳定性.
医学英语 ... 7. Pelvic Fracture （骨盆骨折） 1. Stab Wound （刺创） 2. Incised Wound （切创）.
stabilovolt tube 稳压管stab knife 穿刺刀stable tracer isotope 稳定示踪同位素

entry.def: If someone stabs you, they push a knife or sharp object into your body.

example.ex: Somebody stabbed him in the stomach...
example.tran: 有人朝他肚子上捅了一刀。

example.ex: Dean tried to stab him with a screwdriver...
example.tran: 迪安试图用一把改锥捅他。

entry.def: If you stab something or stab at it, you push at it with your finger or with something pointed that you are holding.

example.ex: Bess stabbed a slice of cucumber...
Goldstone flipped through the pages and stabbed his thumb at the paragraph he was looking for...
example.tran: 戈德斯通翻动书页，大拇指按到他正在寻找的那个段落上。

entry.def: If you have a stab at something, you try to do it.

example.ex: Several tennis stars have had a stab at acting.
example.tran: 好几位网球明星都尝试过从事演艺。

entry.tran: (通常指令人不快的感觉的)突发的一阵
entry.def: You can refer to a sudden, usually unpleasant feeling as a stab of that feeling.

example.ex: ...a stab of pain just above his eye...
example.tran: 他眼睛上方突然的一阵疼痛

example.ex: She felt a stab of pity for him.

entry.def: If you say that someone has stabbed you in the back, you mean that they have done something very harmful to you when you thought that you could trust them. You can refer to an action of this kind as a stab in the back .

example.ex: She felt betrayed, as though her daughter had stabbed her in the back...
example.tran: 她感到被出卖了，就像女儿在自己背后捅了一刀似的。

example.ex: He denounced the defection as a stab in the back.
example.tran: 他谴责这次背叛是背后捅刀子。
